name: MaterialSearch (chn-lee-yumi)
description: [项目级] Semantic search. Search local photos and videos through natural language. AI语义搜索本地素材。以图搜图、查找本地素材、根据文字描述匹配画面、视频帧搜索、根据画面描述搜索视频。。来源: https://github.com/chn-lee-yumi/MaterialSearch

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Semantic search. Search local photos and videos through natural language. AI语义搜索本地素材。以图搜图、查找本地素材、根据文字描述匹配画面、视频帧搜索、根据画面描述搜索视频。

来源: https://github.com/chn-lee-yumi/MaterialSearch
语言: HTML
Stars: 1820

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
LICENSE
README.md
README_ZH.md
docker-compose.yml
gui_config.py
static
static/assets
static/index.html
static/locales
static/login.html

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Text-based image search
- Image-based image search
- Text-based video search (provides matching video clips based on descriptions)
- Image-based video search (searches for video segments based on screenshots)
- Calculation of image-text similarity (provides a score, not very useful)

name: MaterialSearch/static 模块
